dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") the complaining party has
to follow the procedures for making claims of copyright infringement.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf



 

________________________________

From: elated clients [mailto:elatedclients@sellsiusrealestate.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2007 6:03 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: re: Notice of Copyright Infringement

 

Notice to You of Actual Copyright Infringment by lonerate.com of
blog.Sellsiusrealestate.com 

Pursuant to the DMCA you are not entitled to limitations once you have actual notice
of infringement.  

This post by Sellsius was copied verbatim by lonerates.com, whom you host.  See
attachment.  Links to blog posts are below

our post: http://blog.sellsiusrealestate.com/2007/02/20/redfin-rebel-with-a-cause/
lonerates copied said post verbatim:
http://www.lonerates.com/286-redfin-rebel-with-a-cause.html
Notice too that the permalink contains the same title so that search engine
spiders/robots gets both stories.

You are to remove or block access to this material at blog.sellsiusrealestate.com.

Thank you


Joseph G. Ferrara, Esq.
Attorney for Sellsius LLC

425 Madison Avenue, Suite 902
New York, NY 10017

347 535 0696 office
212 644 9802 fax


http://sellsiusrealestate.com/
http://blog.sellsiusrealestate.com/

If Its Real Estate Related, You Can Do It 

________________________________

From: "Copyright" <copyright@theplanet.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2007 4:39 PM
To: elatedclients@sellsiusrealestate.com
Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3156580Z] Lonerates.com is stealing our copyrighted
content 

To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

(multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 

MIME element (text/plain) 

To whom it may concern: 

Lonerates.com, a company that is hosting it's website with you, is stealing our
blogs content - http://blog.sellsiusrealestate.com . They are also stealing 4 other
bloggers content that we know. Lonesrates.com is registered under the company name
Smart Semantics Corp by Tom Avery. 

We have emailed him and left him a voice message and have yet to receive a response.
We have also contacted google because he is violating their google ad sense terms of
use by stealing copyrighted content. 

Please advise us what you intend to do in order to remedy this matter. 

Thank you for your anticipated cooperation. 

Joseph G. Ferrara 
Rudolph D. Bachraty III 
Founders 
Sellsius° 

425 Madison Avenue, Suite 902 
New York, NY 10017 

347 535 0696 office 
212 644 9802 fax 

http://sellsiusrealestate.com/ 
http://blog.sellsiusrealestate.com/ 

If Its Real Estate Related, You Can Do It
